printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1[credit] if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1 credit if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.

printed_text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice has -2 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice has -2 strength for the remainder of this run.

flavor: Sometimes the itsy-bitsy data is most important.
printed_text: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.

flavor: "Take it from me, there is a point where you have so much money you stop caring. That's usually right before it all comes tumbling down."
printed_text: If the Corp has at least 10[credit], as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.
stripped_printed_text: If the Corp has at least 10 credits, as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.

printed_text: +2[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: In running, as in reality, all elements are connected.
printed_text: Interface â†’ 2[credit]: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1 credit: +1 strength.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 0 If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 0 If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."

printed_text:
Resolve two of the following in any order:
  • Gain 3[credit].
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.
stripped_printed_text: Resolve two of the following in any order: * Gain 3 credits. * Draw 2 cards. * Remove 1 tag. * Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.

flavor: They call it "running" because jacking in is mentally and physically exhausting.
printed_text: Choose 1 installed icebreaker and run any server. During that run, the chosen icebreaker gets +2 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Choose 1 installed icebreaker and run any server. During that run, the chosen icebreaker gets +2 strength.

flavor: I foresee the end of all things...
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards.

printed_text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "I'm telling you, free up the emergency accounts. Something's coming; I haven't seen a reaction like that since the tsunami. My god, the screaming..."
printed_text: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.

printed_text:
If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.

flavor: "Your mistake is thinking that it's just business, when really it's a war."
printed_text:
Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage.
2[credit]: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage. 2 credits: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.

flavor: "Person of interest. Noun. Someone who is about to get ****ed by a corp." - Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting
printed_text: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.

printed_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.
stripped_printed_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn. Trace 4 If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.

printed_text: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may <trace>trace 4</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).
stripped_printed_text: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may trace 4 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).

flavor: "For the duration of the emergency" is code for "this is the way things are now."
printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."

flavor: A stock dropping sharply is bad for shareholders, but not neccessarily bad for the company.
printed_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 3[credit] for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
stripped_printed_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 3 credits for each agenda in the Runner's score area.

printed_text: If you have at least 10[credit], each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5[credit] in your credit pool.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 10 credits, each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5 credits in your credit pool.
